content: {"name": "Deo Gratias Ministries Detroit", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves residents of zip codes: 48205, 48224, 48225, 48234, and 48236. Residents outside this zip codes can receive an emergency food bag as a one-time courtesy.", "email": "", "url": "https://dgmdetroit.org/events", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "15879 Seven Mile East", "address_2": null, "city": "Regent Park", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.43603969999999, "longitude": -82.9566614}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 743-0477", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
